title: 820-3115b bios with clean me
message:
Hi I purchased  a board off eBay and I repaired the water damaged areas. but it has no bios chip I’d like to do a clean ME and switch serial# from a donor chip.  I searched on this forum but all the “clean” or “test” bios say “in owners trash” or just don’t download. I wanted to use ME injector to just change the ME region first and fix serial # later.
with a donor bios fans spins but that’s about it.

title: 820-3115b bios with clean me
message: Thank you very much. Do you happen to have one for 820-2850? That’s all I will need. If possible that would be great

title: 820-3115b bios with clean me
message: Unfortunately that didn’t work :( it also does nothing. But I removed the bios from the 820-3115 board awaiting pch and that bios chimes on this board but has no video :( so I guess I’ll just keep looking for another bios thank you 2informatico

title: 820-3115b bios with clean me
message:
The file I sent is marking as tested OK.
Write it on other chip...

title: 820-3115b bios with clean me
message: How long should it take for the “ME” to finish its process of getting “reacquainted” with hardware? I waited like 2 mins is this enough For the machine to boot? Sometimes I notice longer wait times than others

title: 820-3115b bios with clean me
message:
